video:video.video:title: A Windows Virtual Desktop demo on management tools for IT
video:video.video:description: In this Windows Virtual Desktop demo, IT pros can learn how to manage Microsoft's DaaS offering and what tools are available to help them take control of WVD.

video:video.video:title: How to use Liquidware FlexApp for virtual app layering
video:video.video:description: The Liquidware FlexApp tool allows IT to manage virtual apps more effectively, including fewer master desktop images and pushing out updates to in-use layered virtual apps.

video:video.video:title: How to automate software installation for Windows VDI
video:video.video:description: Software installation can be mind-numbingly tedious. Here's how to use Chocolatey, a package manager, to automate the process for virtual desktops running Windows.

video:video.video:title: How to perform per-machine install of Microsoft OneDrive, Teams for VDI
video:video.video:description: Microsoft OneDrive and Teams can be challenging for VDI, but a per-machine installer can make the process much easier. Watch this video to find out the details.

video:video.video:title: How to save FSLogix profile containers to Azure Blob Storage
video:video.video:description: FSLogix profiles are a great way to take full advantage of Windows Virtual Desktop. IT can save time and money with this step-by-step process to save FSLogix profile containers to Azure Blob Storage.
